page.title: 09Hayes Carnival
page.content: The Hayes Carnival was on Saturday 13th July 1985 from 2pm. till 12 midnight. The procession left Hayes Stadium and went to Botwell Church.It then went down Central Avenue on to the Uxbridge Road to the Beck Theatre. From there it returned to the stadium. There was a fair with all different kinds of rides and stalls.There were stalls where if you picked an odd number from a hat you won a prize,or you could hook a duck and win a poster.There were about thirty rides. At night all their lights were switched on and it was a wonderful sight.Also there was a refreshment tent and one for lost children.Ever since I was small Ihave liked the merry-go-round. By Sarah Owens
